notes: The rune is only created if the item wielder makes the kill. Kills made with summons do not count.
The rune is always spawned halfway through the distance between the wielder and the killed target. This means on global kills, the rune may spawn very far away.
Triggers on any hero kill done by the wielder, including clones, allies, and even self-denies.
The rune has no duration, it lasts until picked up.
Multiple instances of Kill Bounty fully stack. Each Pirate Hat creates its a Bounty Rune on kills.
abilities.description: Creates a bounty rune between you and your victim when you kill an enemy hero.
